parameters.name: BindIp
parameters.description: The IP address bound to the port.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Extend
parameters.description: Specifies whether fuzzy search by port number is supported. If you want to use fuzzy search, set the parameter to **1**. If you set the parameter to a different value or leave the parameter empty, fuzzy search is not supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The listening port of the server.

parameters.name: ProcName
parameters.description: The name of the server process.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the IDs.
